name: Check-in at the Hospital: The First Surgery Shocked the Nation!
summary: First day check-in, reward 【World-Class Cardiac Surgery Experience】Second day check-in, reward 【World-Class Neurosurgery Experience】Third day check-in, reward 【World-Class Carotid Surgery Experience】......Three months after Qin Feng started his internship at the hospital, his originally peaceful life was disrupted.When everyone was at a loss, he performed a rescue operation that shocked the entire internet.
author: Drunk in Wind and Rain
